attributes.title: Black lives WILL and will ALWAYS matter
attributes.review: THIS APP TOOK ALL MY CREDIT INFORMATION 😡🤬AND WHEN I LOGGED IN BAD MUSIC STARTED PLAYING AND MY DAD STARTED YELLING AT ME!🖕🏽THIS APP ALSO TOOK 6 HOURS TOO DOWNLOAD WHEN MY WIFI IS PERFECTLY FINE!🖕🏽🤬😡WHEN I LOGGED IN IT STARTED GLITCHING AND AN ORANGE CREATURE CAME UP ON MY SCREEN!MY LITTLE SISTER STARTED CRYING WHEN SHE SAW THE ORANGE CREATURE BECAUSE IT WAS SO UGLY!🍊🖕🏽IT SHOWED AN ORANGE CREATURE WHEN IM ALLERGIC TO ORANGES!!🤬😡WHEN THE MUSIC STARTED PLAYING MY CAR RAN AWAY!THEY BETTER BUY ME A NEW ONE🖕🏽
